title: Update UI color scheme to black and red theme

requirements.summary: Update the dark mode color palette in frontend/index.css to use a black and red color scheme
acceptanceCriteria: Primary color scheme uses red tones instead of current colors
Background colors use true black or near-black values
Text maintains sufficient contrast for readability on black backgrounds
Interactive elements (buttons, links, badges) use red accent colors
All CSS color variables are updated to reflect black and red theme

file_operations.description: Update all OKLCH color variables in the :root selector for dark mode theme. Replace background colors with true black (0% 0 0) or near-black values. Update primary colors to red tones using OKLCH format (e.g., 55% 0.22 25 for primary red). Ensure foreground colors use high-lightness values for sufficient contrast on black backgrounds. Update accent, muted, and destructive color variables to use red-based hues. Maintain WCAG AA contrast ratios for all text colors on black backgrounds.

requirements.summary: Update the Tailwind CSS configuration in frontend/tailwind.config.js to reflect the black and red color scheme
acceptanceCriteria: Tailwind theme colors are updated to match the black and red palette
All color references in the config align with the updated CSS variables
Chart colors maintain sufficient contrast on black backgrounds

file_operations.description: Update the theme.extend.colors configuration to align with the new black and red color scheme. Ensure all color keys (background, foreground, primary, secondary, muted, accent, destructive, border, input, ring) reference the updated CSS variables from index.css. Update chart color definitions (chart-1 through chart-5) to use red-toned variations that maintain sufficient contrast on black backgrounds. Verify that all OKLCH color references match the new black and red palette.
